Package com.googlecode.catchexception.apis.internal.hamcrest

This private package provides matchers for CatchExceptionHamcrestMatchers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ExceptionMessageMatcher<T extends Exception> Creates a matcher that matches an exception with a certain message.
ExceptionNoCauseMatcher<T extends Exception> Creates a matcher that matches an exception that has no cause.
 

Package com.googlecode.catchexception.apis.internal.hamcrest Description

This private package provides matchers for CatchExceptionHamcrestMatchers.
